about_description: Learn more about my work and creative philosophy.
about_content: I believe that stories have the power to shift perspectives. As a producer and entrepreneur, my goal isn't just to make things look good, but to make them feel real. From managing complex productions to founding LightVision, I bridge the gap between creative chaos and strategic execution.
timeline_1999_description: Born. The production budget was low, but the potential was high.
timeline_2008_description: Suspended from school for the first time. Critics called it "rebellious"; I called it "method acting".
timeline_2015_description: Directed my first short film. Learned that passion beats budget every time.
timeline_2020_description: Founded LightVision. Started bridging the gap between creative vision and strategic execution.
timeline_2024_description: Expanding into new creative territories. The story continues to evolve.
contact_description: Let's work together on your next project.
contact_description_text: Whether you have a script, a brand vision, or just a spark of an idea – I'm here to produce it into existence.
